text:
@LouisianaGov Dr.Samadi There will be NO second wave of coronavirus. We may have mini spikes or baby waves and are ready for it. Don’t let panic & fear get ahead of common sense. We can open our country safely and responsibly. 
40 million unemployed Americans are counting on real facts & data!
